Things Makes Us The

Best Hospital in Agra

Emergency Services

Rapid, expert emergency care available 24/7 for your urgent medical needs.

4 Modular Operation Theatres

With 4 Modular operation theaters, we ensure seamless surgical workflow

Legacy 0f 30+ Years

Proudly serving for over 30 years with excellence in healthcare.

Empanelled with Almost All Insurance

We accept various insurance plans for your convenience and peace of mind.

ABOUT US

Upadhyay Hospital

Upadhyay Hospital is One of the best hospital in Agra, which is private multi specialty hospital with ultra modern facilities catering to the needs of the patients in and around Agra city with 100-beds capacity with Emergency Medicine, Critical Care, Accident & Trauma under Emergency Medicine Dept. with ICU and CCU facilities.

  • Upadhyay Hospital was established in Shaheed Nagar Agra in year 1994.
  • 100 bedded Critical Care/ Superspeciality Hospital, Cardiac research centre & Heart Institute
  • We aim to provide highest standard of health care services in most affordable rates to all patients under one roof.
  • Upadhyay Hospital is an empanelled hospital for ECHS, Ayushman Bharat, Pt Deen Dayal Scheme, FCI, Power Grid of India, ESI, Railways, BSNL and CGHS.
  • We provide cash less facilities for Insured Beneficiary for all Insurance Companies.

+91 9675403050

For Emergency

READ MORE

Our Departments

Discover our range of specialized departments offering expert care and tailored
solutions to meet your healthcare needs efficiently. Upadhyay Hospital is one of the best Hospital in Agra.

  • Cardiology
  • Obstetrics and gynaecology
  • Critical Care
  • Pediatrics Care
  • Nephrology
  • ‎General Surgery
  • Orthopaedics
  • ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ Neurology‎ ‎ ‎ ‎

  • Urology
  • Plastic Surgery
  • Internal Medicine
  • Pulmonary medicine
  • ENT

Cardiology

Upadhyay Hospital is the best hospital In Agra The department is headed by DR. VARUN SHARMA MBBS,MD, DM (Cardiology), an interventional Cardiologist. A state-of-the-art cardiac CATH lab is functional with Facilities of Angiography, Angioplasty, Valvoplasty, ICD and CRT implantation, ventricular assisting devices implantation, Stenting, Holter Monitoring and Pace Maker device. A 15 bedded dedicated cardiac care unit fully equipped with advanced monitoring systems and specialized staff is available. Our doctors & staff members are specially trained in tackling and readily managing all cardiac emergencies.
Non invasive Cardiac facilities:
  • ECG
  • 2D Echo
  • Transesophageal Echo
  • 24 Hr Holter Monitoring
  • Stress Echocardiography
  • Strain Imaging And Speckle Tracking
  • Pediatric Echocardiography
  • TMT
Invasive Cardiac facilities:
  • Coronary Angiography, Coronary Angioplasty, Complex Cardiac Interventions like Bifurcation lesions, Chronic total Occlusion, Imaging Guided PCI (IVUS and OCT)
  • Functional imaging: FFR, Calcium Modification Devices: Rotablation and IVL
  • Device Implantation: Temporary and Permanent Pacemaker Implantation, ICD and CRT implantation

Faculty of Cardiology Department

Dr. Varun Sharma

MD,DM (Cardio)

READ MORE

Obstetrics and gynaecology

Department of Obstetrics And Gynaecology Under the aegis of Dr. Neha Upadhyay MBBS, MS (OBS & GYN) (Gold medalist) and Dr. Ayushi Gupta Upadhyay MBBS, MS (OBS & GYN) aims to provide the best gynaecological and Obstetric care in the City. We understand that women across different age groups have different health complications. At Upadhyay Hospital, a lot of emphasis is laid on providing top notch gynaecological treatment. The Department of Obstetrics & Gynaecology across all units aim to provide the most comprehensive women’s healthcare services.

Highly trained technicians, the latest technology & equipment, and some of the best gynaecologists in Agra ensure that complex clinical situations are dealt with ease and expertise. Our obstetrics department promises the best pregnancy care – starting from pre-conception to the post-natal period.

Salient Features Includes

Providing the best pregnancy care with renowned consultants specialized in dealing with High risk pregnancies & Medical disorders in pregnancy.
Combined clinic to deal with Endocrine (Diabetes, Thyroid etc.), Neurology & Haematology problems in pregnancy
Electronic Fetal Monitoring in Labour for the safety of the baby
Customized LDRP (Labour, Delivery, Recovery & Postpartum) Suites
Regular antenatal classes for pregnant ladies to care the unborn baby
Dietary advice for all pregnant & lactating mother
Painless labour facility for normal delivery
Gynaecology Subspecialties
Infertility & IVF with Folliculometry Screening
Urogynaecology with Urodynamics
Onco-Gynaecology with Colposcopy Clinic
Laparoscopy Surgery for Cyst, Lap Hysterectomy etc.
24 hrs USG facility for Emergency patients
24 hrs facility for antenatal CTG (Cardiotocography) to monitor High-risk pregnancies
24 hrs CT Scan, X-Ray & pathology.
State-of-the-art NICU to provide support to babies from 26 weeks of gestational and also all underweight & preterm babies
Multispecialty support for babies with congenital problems through our Paediatric Surgery, Orthopaedics, Pulmonologist, Nephrologist etc

Our Services:
  • Infertility
  • Antenatal Care
  • Garbh Sanskar, contraception care like Coper-T, Mirena
  • 24X7 Painless Delivery & Caesarian delivery available
  • Laparoscopic gynocology Surgeries
  • Vaginal & abdominal hysterectomy
  • Menstrual Disorders – non-surgical & surgical options
  • Post Menopausal Care
  • Fibroids, Prolapse, tumors, cysts – diagnosis & surgeries

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Neha Upadhyay

MBBS, MS (GYNAE)

Dr. Ayushi Gupta Upadhyay

MBBS, M.S. (OBSTETRICS AND GYNAECOLOGY)

READ MORE
All Kinds Of Obstetric Emergency Management Available 24×7

Critical Care

Our critical care department provides expertise in a broad range of diseases including

  • Acute kidney injury
  • Acute liver failure
  • ARDS
  • Acute respiratory failure
  • Cerebral edema
  • pulmonary edema
  • Congenital metabolic
  • disorder
  • Drug overdose
  • Influenza
  • Intracranial hemorrhage
  • Heart failure
  • Metabolic disorders
  • Multiple organ failure
  • Pulmonary embolism
  • Pneumonia
  • Septic shock
  • Sepsis
  • Shock
  • Stroke

Our highly trained team of critical care specialists are present 24×7 at the hospital and are available to perform life-saving measures for patients in need of immediate medical attention. In addition to the critical care specialists, our ICU provides a high level of bedside care at the hands of dedicated critical care nurses, respiratory specialists, nutritionists, physiotherapists, and support staff. This specialized group ensures that the highest standards of multidisciplinary support and care are provided to critically ill patients. The advanced monitoring technology lets our medical professionals watch every hour of your improvement as you regain strength whilst ensuring that the continuum of care is always met

Our Services
  • A 10 bedded ICU, 10 bedded PICU & 10 bedded NICU
  • Ultra modern ventilators, Defibrillators, Incubators, monitoring systems.
  • Bedside renal replacement therapy (Dialysis)
  • Multidisciplinary Holistic Patient Care
  • Protocols and evidence based systems of management and interventions

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Rajeev Upadhyay

M.D., FIACM. (PHY)

Dr. Shivam Upadhyay

MBBS, M.D. (INTERNAL MEDICINE) [GOLD MEDALIST]

Dr. Rahul Yadav

MBBS, DA Consultant anaesthesiologist and critical care specialist

Dr. Navneet Goyal

MD ANESTHESIA AND CRITICAL CARE

Dr. Vineeta

MBBS, MD (Anesthesiologist & Critical care specialist)

Dr. Deepika chaubey

DnB ANAESTHESIA AND CRITICAL CARE

READ MORE

Pediatrics Care

As pediatricians at Upadhyay Hospital, we specialize in caring for the unique needs of children from infancy through young adulthood. We provide newborn care, preventive health care and therapeutic care for childhood diseases. We aim to put ourselves in parents’ shoes to endeavor primarily on a child’s health. Our doctors are empowered with extensive knowledge and experience. We want the best holistic development of your child at the physical, emotional, and social levels

Our Pediatric department is equipped with a 10-bedded dedicated NICU and a 10-bedded dedicated PICU to provide the best possible critical care for all pediatric emergencies. Excellent paramedical support is available like physiotherapy, dietetics, nutrition, child guidance, etc. The Paediatric department consultants are Dr. Gaurav Khandelwal (MD), Dr. Unnat Kulshreshth (MD), Dr. RK Gupta (MD), Dr. Prakhar Mohania (MD), Dr Ram Avatar Sharma (MS/ McH Pediatric Surgeon) Common conditions that are frequently treated are allergies, dyslexia, asthma, seizures, cerebral palsy, and pediatric heart diseases Facility for immunization of various diseases is also available.

Our Services
  • NICU PICU
  • Pediatric Cardiology
  • Pediatric Surgery
  • Nutritional deficiencies
  • Underweight Issues
  • Child Vaccination
  • Treatment of Allergies
  • Treatment of Asthma

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Gaurav Khandelwal

MBBS, DCH (CHILD)

Dr. Unnat Kulshrestha

M.D. (Child Specialist)

Dr. R. K. Gupta

Dr. Prakhar Mohania

READ MORE

Nephrology

Provides comprehensive care for patients with kidney diseases. The team of nephrologists, nurses, and other healthcare professionals provide diagnosis, treatment, and management of kidney diseases, including chronic kidney disease, acute kidney injury, and end-stage renal disease. We provide treatment for common diseases like Kidney Stones, Bladder Stones, Ureter Stones, Urinary Tract Infections (UTIs), Erectile Dysfunction, and kidney failure. Our Center has collaborated with renowned dialysis center Brand NephroPlus to provide the best dialysis care in Agra.

Diseases of the kidney and related structures are managed by consultant Nephrologists Dr.Anubhav Agarwal MD (Medicine) DM (Nephrology), Dr Kairavi Bhardwaj MBBS, DNB (Nephrology).

Our Services:
  • Hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis
  • Separate post-renal transplant intensive care unit
  • Hypertension Management
  • CKD Patient Management and Education
  • Kidney Biopsy
  • Hemodialysis
  • CRRT, SLED, IHD
  • Bedside Hemodialysis
  • Plasmapheresis, PlasmaExchange
  • Peritoneal dialysis

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Anubhav Agarwal

MD, DM (NEPHRO)

Dr Kairavi Bhardwaj

READ MORE

General Surgery

Our department comprises well 4 equipped operation theaters & 20+ ventilator-assisted ICU beds for the best care before, during, and after surgery. All types of emergency elective and minor surgical procedures by leading general surgeon of Agra

Types of surgeries performed include:
  • All types of Emergency- Trauma and abdominal surgeries
  • All inguinal and incisional hernia mesh plastic surgeries
  • Anal surgeries like Piles (Hemorrhoids), Fistula, and Fissure
  • Local skin problems like Boils abscesses and cysts
  • All Cancer-related surgeries, Breast, Thyroid, intestinal, rectal & neurosurgical tumors
  • Breast surgeries – Scarless swelling removal
  • Thyroid and Vascular surgeries
  • Hepatobiliary – Liver cancer, Gal Bladder cancer, major pancreatic surgeries
  • Gall Bladder – Gall Bladder stone, Sludge Infection treated with advanced laparoscopic surgeries.
  • Pediatric surgeries – Birth defects like phimosis treated by pediatric surgeons

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Vineet Verma

General Laparoscopic & Laser Surgeon

Dr. Deeraj Yadav

MBBS,MS, (GENERAL & LAPROSCOPIC SURGEON)

Dr. Rajat Upadhyay

MBBS, M.S. (GENERAL SURGEON)

READ MORE

Orthopaedics

Well-equipped department with emergency and joint replacement services as well as physiotherapy for rehabilitation. The trauma of limbs, spine, and soft tissue reconstruction by orthopedic surgeons integrated with our plastic surgery unit.
Our Services
  • Joint Replacement – total, partial with high-quality implants
  • Emergency Fracture reduction surgeries
  • Frozen Shoulder, Arthritis
  • Sports Injury
  • Spinal tumor, slip disc, TB fixation surgeries.
  • Physiotherapy with ultrasound technology for post-operative care.
  • Paediatric Ortho Care

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Kartikeya Sharma

M.S. (Ortho).

Dr. Ajay Bansal

MBBS, M.S. (ORTHOPEDICS)

READ MORE

Neurology

Treatment and care of neurology pertains to the brain, spine, sensory organs and the nerves that connect them. Neurological disorders are diseases that affect the nervous system, and there are more than 600 known diseases that affect the nervous system. Some of the commonly known diseases or disorders treated at Upadhyay Hospital, are stroke, brain tumors, epilepsy, Alzheimers, headache, aneurysms, multiple sclerosis, peripheral neuropathy, memory disorders, Postherpetic neuralgia, Dural Arteriovenous Fistulae and rare disorders such as frontal temporal dementia.

The diagnosis and treatment of disorders of nervous system are managed by consultants Dr. Manoj Kumar Malav MD, DM (Neurology). We have an experienced ICU staff to deal with all neurological emergencies and provide adequate critical care to Neurological patients.

Our Services:
  • EEG, MRI, CSF Analysis
  • Stroke Medicine
  • Revascularisation Procedures
  • Encephalopathies
  • Alzheimers, Parkinson’s Disease, Senile Dementia
  • Spinal Shock
  • Traumatic spine injuries
  • Tumors
  • Compression Fractures
  • Spinal infections
  • Spinal Stenosis
  • Defects in the cerebellum
  • Nerve root compressions
  • Tethered spinal cords

Meet Our Doctor

Dr. Manoj Kumar Malav

MD, DM (NEUROLOGY)

READ MORE

Neurosurgery

Our Neurosurgery Department delivers specialized care led by experienced neurosurgeons and neurologists. From advanced brain and spinal surgeries to neurovascular interventions, we offer cutting-edge treatments using state-of-the-art technology for optimal patient outcomes.

Our Services
  • Emergency Brain Surgeries for serious brain injuries
  • Craniotomy, Brain tumor surgeries, VP shunt
  • Spinal Surgeries, Spinal trauma, tumor and slip disc surgeries Neurovascular Interventions
  • Brain and spine TB
  • Trauma And Emergency Care
  • Pediatric Neurosurgery
  • Neurocritical Care
  • Image-Guided and microscopic Surgeries.

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Gaurav Dhakre

Dr. Tarunesh Sharma

MS, MCH (NEURO- SURGEON)

Dr. Mayank Agrawal

MS, MCH (NEURO-SURGEON)

READ MORE

All kinds of Neurosurgery emergency management available 24×7

Gastro Surgery

Our Gastrointestinal Surgery Department provides specialized care under the expertise of experienced Gastro surgeons and gastroenterologists. We offer a comprehensive range of surgical interventions and treatments for gastrointestinal disorders, ensuring personalized care and optimal outcomes for our patients.
Our Services:
  • Minimally Invasive Surgeries
  • Gall Bladder & Bile duct surgeries
  • Colorectal Surgery
  • Esophageal and Other GI Cancer treatment
  • Hepatobiliary Surgery
  • Pancreatic Surgery
  • Endoscopy and colonoscopy are also available
  • Emergency laparotomy for all GI or solid organ trauma

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Vijay Saini

MS. MCHGI SURGEON

READ MORE
All Kinds Of Emergency Services Available 24×7

Urology

Our expert team of urologists, surgeons, pain specialists, and therapists are dedicated to treating various urological conditions. From infections to complex surgeries, we provide specialized care for your urological health needs.
Our Services:
  • Expert urologists, surgeons, pain specialists, and therapists
  • Comprehensive treatment for diverse urological conditions
  • Specialized care for urinary tract infections and complex surgeries
  • Personalized approach to promote optimal urological health

Meet Our Doctors

Dr. Manav Agarwal

MS, MCH (UROLOGIST)

Dr. Madhukar

READ MORE

Plastic Surgery

Our plastic surgery and reconstruction department provides emergency well as cosmetic plastic surgery facilities in adjunct with the trauma surgeons and Orthopedic surgeons. Reconstructive surgeries such as Onco plastic approaches are also available.
Our Services
  • Skin grafting (split thickness and full thickness)
  • Rotation flaps
  • Trauma cosmetic reconstruction
  • Onco plastic reconstruction
  • Cosmetic procedures such as scar removals

Meet Our Doctor

Puneet Kumar Bharadwaj

MS, MCH (Plastic Surgeon)

READ MORE
All Kinds Of Emergency Services Available 24×7

Department of Internal Medicine

This department provides broad range of services for diagnosis and treatment by doctors skilled in the management of patients who have undifferentiated or multi-system disease processes. It has round the clock back up from allied departments like cardiology, endocrinology, gastroenterology, neurology, nephrology and psychiatry. The department is looked after by a tremendously experienced team under the prestigious leadership of Dr. Rajeev Upadhyay and aided by Dr. Shivam Upadhyay. The team has been engaged in practice of diagnostic and therapeutic medicine for over 3 decades in the city of Agra.
Our Services
  • General OPD
  • Speciality Clinics(Diabetes, Hypertension, thyroid disorders etc)
  • Critical care management
  • Infectious disease management
  • IPD consultation
  • Lifestyle and dietary counseling
  • Adult vaccination
  • Preventive care

Meet Our Doctor

Doctor Name

designation

READ MORE
All Kinds Of Emergency Services Available 24×7

Department of Pulmonary medicine

The Department of pulmonary medicine is one of the most comprehensive units dealing with an entire range of respiratory conditions including Asthma and Allergic Diseases, Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD), Lung Infections including Tuberculosis, Interstitial Lung Diseases, Pulmonary Hypertension. Dr. Rajeev Upadhyay is an expert in chest diseases and has a legacy of over 3 decades in this field. He is amongst the pioneers for Respiratory medicine in the city of Agra.
Services:
  • Allergies and Asthama Clinic
  • Bronchoscopy Lab
  • Bedside Lung ultrasound
  • Tuberculosis Clinic
  • Thoracotomy, thoracentesis, pleurodesis
  • Pulmonary critical care
  • Pulmonary Rehabilitation and chest physiotherapy clinic
  • Spirometry and 6 minute walk test

Meet Our Doctor

Dr. Rajeev Upadhyay

M.D., FIACM. (PHY)

READ MORE
All Kinds Of Emergency Services Available 24×7

ENT

Our experienced team of ENT surgeons is dedicated to providing comprehensive care for ear, nose, and throat disorders. From common issues like Sinusitis, and hearing loss to complex ENT and head & neck tumor surgeries, we offer high-quality surgical & nonsurgical services.
Our Services:
  • Otoscopy
  • Microscopic Surgeries for ear & head surgeries.
  • Nasal Endoscopy And Rhinoscopy functional sinus surgeries
  • Laryngoscopy – direct & indirect emergency neck trauma management
  • Salivary gland & thyroid tumor surgeries
  • Allergic rhinitis and seasonal flu – prompt management with latest vaccines.
  • Tonsillectomy And Adenoidectomy
  • Sinus Surgery (Endoscopic Sinus Surgery)

Meet Our Doctor

Dr. Mudit Gupta

MS ENT, Head & Neck surgeon

READ MORE

    Why People Choose Us?

    People choose Upadhyay Hospital because here we provide them with great care using the latest technology. Our staff is knowledgeable and compassionate. We offer a wide range of services and facilities to serve our patients and are committed and dedicated to improving lives and making them better.     ABOUT US
    Exceptional care:
    Our hospital is renowned for providing exceptional care, characterized by attention to detail, thorough assessments, and personalized treatment plans. Every patient receives individualized attention to ensure the best possible outcomes.
    Advanced technology:

    Upadhyay Hospital is equipped with cutting-edge technology and state-of-the-art medical equipment. From advanced imaging modalities, we utilize the latest innovations to deliver precise diagnoses and effective treatments.

    Experienced staff:

    Our team comprises highly skilled and experienced healthcare professionals, including board-certified physicians, nurses, diaticien & physiotherapiest. With years of expertise in their respective fields, they are dedicated to delivering quality care and ensuring patient safety.

    Comprehensive services:
    From primary care and emergency services to specialized treatments and surgical procedures, we offer a comprehensive range of medical services under one roof. Patients can access a variety of specialties and treatment options conveniently and efficiently.
    Compassionate approach:
    At Upadhyay Hospital, we understand that medical care extends beyond just treating symptoms. Our compassionate staff provides emotional support, respect, and dignity to every patient, fostering a healing environment where individuals feel valued and cared for.

    Our Infrastructure

    Explore our modern infrastructure equipped with state-of-the-art facilities, advanced technology, and comfortable amenities to ensure a superior healthcare experience for all our patients.
